document.masterDocTitle: Pamphagidae (Orthoptera: Acridoidea) from the Palaearctic Region: taxonomy, classification, keys to genera and a review of the tribe Nocarodeini I. Bolívar

Distribution. S.W. Turkey : Muğla , Manisa , Denizli , Antalya , Isparta , S.W. Konya provinces ( Fig. 845 ).
Remarks. The type locality Sandras Mountain is the border of Muğla and Denizli provinces. The Akşehir (Sultan Dağı) record of Demirsoy (1973) should be confirmed.
